description: The Eastern Redbud is an amazing tree due to its stunning splashes of pink and white spring bloom. It is an elegant, flowering tree that will appeal to any gardener in search of color and beauty. With its low canopy, it reaches about 20 to 30 feet high and is perfect for small gardens or as a lawn specimen. It has a unique heart shape along with pointed, dark green foliage which then turns to a brilliant yellow in fall. Additionally, its extraordinary cascading clusters of pink blossoms attract a plethora of pollinators, making it great for areas where sustainability matters.
